name: macos_install_vscode_test
description: 1. Install node and typescript. 2. Install ESLint extensions. (merged with TSLint already) 3. Install material icon theme as extension.  4. Install path intellisense as extension for imports.  5. Prettier - Code formatter (like black and isort in python).  6. Create `index.html` via `html:5` in your file. And include the js file. 7. `tsc app.ts` to generate the javascript.
